page.title: 10Queensgate Shopping Centre
page.content: {Queensgate}has been voted the best new covered shopping centre in Europe by the International Council of Shopping Centres. Situated in the heart of this ancient Cathedral city Queensgate blends marble, mirror glass and stainless steel on the inside with stone, hand-made bricks and lead roofs on the outside. Great care has been taken to integrate the new centre with the old buildings surrounding it and many of these have been retained and refurbished giving them a new lease of life. Queensgate has been called the Jewel in the Crown of the new city and has made Peterborough the natural centre for an area of more than 600,000 people in the East Midlands and East Anglia. There are six major stores and 80 shops and restaurants in a controlled climate together with car parks for 2,000 cars.
